import BookmarkIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Bookmark"; import { Pagination, Rating, Stack } from "@mui/material"; import Button from "@mui/material/Button"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import Header from "../components/Header"; const FullResult = () => { const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm(); const [showDetails, setShowDetails] = useState(false); const [value, setValue] = useState("0"); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(JSON.stringify(data)); }; const handleChange = (event, newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; const handleButtonClick = () => { setShowDetails(!showDetails); }; return (
The title of the patent

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

{showDetails && (
kind: kind
num_claims: num_claims
)}
); }; export default FullResult;
